title: "Publications"

```{python}
#| echo: false

from IPython.display import display, HTML
from jinja2 import Environment, FileSystemLoader
import json

def recursive_authors(res, lst):
  if len(lst) == 1:
    if not res:
      return lst[0], []
    else:
      res += " and " + lst[0]
      return res, []
  else:
    res += lst[0] + ", "
    return recursive_authors(res, lst[1:])

def authorList(lst):
  return recursive_authors("", lst)[0]

with open("assets/academics_publications.json") as f:
  data = json.load(f)

environment = Environment(loader=FileSystemLoader("assets"))
template = environment.get_template("academics_publications.html.jinja")
output = template.render(
  publications=data["publications"],
  authorList=authorList
)
display(HTML(output))
```
